title: RP adjustment again?
body:
We did get lower RP compared to most other servers already. Why decrease its value even further? The bonus RP on purchase of $10 and above is higher, but it still gives 60 lesser RP for $5, 100 lesser for $10, 200 lesser for $20, 350 lesser for $35, 500 lesser for $50, and a whole 1100 lesser for $100 compared to the previous pricing.
 {{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}

replies.body:
One thing to note is that the *current* changes are affecting most servers (including NA), and are primarily due to taxation of online goods and services. For the most part, costs of RP will remain more or less the same, relatively speaking, when compared to other servers. All Riot is doing is changing the prices a bit to compensate for tax, which *literally everyone* who provides goods/services does.

So far as the changes from 4 years ago, that was intended to bring various regions in-line with each other (providing a relatively equal $ to RP ratio, considering exchange rates), and just about every other region (and even NZ) that experienced those changes got hit *harder* than Aus/OCE. Even *after* that change, we were still getting better $ to RP ratios than NA (considering exchange rates).
